abilities.description: While the lookout post is crewed, you are forewarned. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3ff03b51f620ab26]{Undertake an Expedition} (+wits) to carefully navigate a perilous course, or if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to spot a hidden or distant threat, you may reroll one challenge die.

Once per situation, when you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by studying a notable sighting or location from a distance, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, envision an aspect of the situation or a vulnerability of your foe you can use to your advantage; take another +1 momentum.

When you come upon a rare and awe-inspiring sight, and use the lookout post for a better vantage point, choose one.

  • Gain insight: take +1 momentum
  • Gain inspiration: take +1 spirit
